trans-unit.source: Indicates how to play sounds when calling audio methods.
trans-unit.target: 오디오 메서드를 호출할 때 소리를 재생 하는 방법을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the `AudioPlayMode` enumeration members to control how the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A> method plays sounds.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 `AudioPlayMode` 열거형 멤버 제어 하는 방법을 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A>소리를 재생 하는 메서드.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound in the background.
trans-unit.target: 로 인해는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""> </xref> 메서드를 백그라운드로 소리를 재생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.

Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound in the background until the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 로 인해는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""> </xref> 될 때까지 백그라운드에서 소리를 재생 하려면 메서드는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop*>

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.
Causes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""></xref> method to play the sound, and waits until it completes before calling code continues.
trans-unit.target: 로 인해는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Audio.Play" name="My.Computer.Audio.Play" href=""> </xref> 메서드를 호출 코드를 계속 하기 전에 완료 될 때까지 대기와 소리를 재생 합니다.
